meanings.sent1: The uncertified document was not accepted by the school.
meanings.sent2: The uncertified product did not meet the safety standards.
meanings.sent3: The uncertified cake recipe turned out to be a disaster.
meanings.sent4: Her uncertified talent shone brightly during the performance.
meanings.sent5: The uncertified building materials posed a risk to the construction workers.

meanings.definition: Not having official documentation or verification.
meanings.sent1: He was denied entry because he had an uncertified passport.
meanings.sent2: The uncertified driver was not allowed to operate the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The uncertified ticket caused confusion at the concert entrance.
meanings.sent4: Her uncertified diploma raised doubts about her qualifications.
meanings.sent5: The uncertified signature on the contract made it invalid.
